description: Primes p such that digits of p appear in p^2.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: ok[p_] := (idp = Union[ IntegerDigits[p]]; Intersection[idp, Union[ IntegerDigits[p^2]]] == idp); Select[ Prime[Range[400]], ok] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 30 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (intersect, nub)a030079 n = a030079_list !! (n-1)a030079_list = filter f a000040_list where   f p = pd == pd `intersect` (nub $ show (p^2)) where       pd = nub $ show p-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 03 2011
author: _Patrick De Geest_
